name: Modern House in Banani
description: This modern 4-bedroom house is located in the vibrant Banani area of Dhaka. It features spacious rooms, a well-equipped kitchen, and an open backyard. The house is conveniently situated near shops, schools, and entertainment venues.

name: Charming House near GEC Circle
description: This charming 3-bedroom house is situated near the GEC Circle area in Chittagong. It boasts a cozy atmosphere, well-appointed bedrooms, and a lovely backyard. The house will be available soon for those seeking a comfortable and convenient living space.

name: Delightful House in Lamabazar
description: Discover this delightful 2-bedroom house in the heart of Lamabazar, Sylhet. With a cozy interior, well-maintained bedrooms, and a small garden, this house is available now for those seeking a tranquil living experience.

name: Upcoming House in Boalia
description: Explore this upcoming 3-bedroom house in Boalia, Rajshahi. With modern design elements, spacious bedrooms, and a well-lit atmosphere, this house will be available soon for those seeking a stylish and comfortable living space.

name: Cozy House in Sonadanga
description: Step into this cozy 2-bedroom house located in the Sonadanga area of Khulna. With a warm and inviting interior, well-designed bedrooms, and proximity to key amenities, this house is available now for a delightful living experience.
